TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed GroupBoxState extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the visual state of a group box that is drawn with visual styles.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.GroupBoxState> values correspond to the states of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement> objects exposed by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.VisualStyleElement.Button.GroupBox> class. The <xref:System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.GroupBoxState> values are also used as an argument in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.GroupBoxRenderer.DrawGroupBox%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.GroupBoxState Disabled = int32(2)
.field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.VisualStyles.GroupBoxState Normal = int32(1)

Docs.summary: The group box has the default appearance.
